ygData.subject: Re: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: Why though you just say how you feel no reasons. The 50 s have done everything they can and then some. I ve been to PoF and PoH but they are both a waste now.
ygData.messageBody:
Why though you just say how you feel no reasons. The 50's have done
everything they can and then some. I've been to PoF and PoH but they are
both a waste now. The most fun thing to do for a 50 is to twink a char and
play that char for awhile. I still don't have a problem with twinking and I
never will.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 9:06 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>Because your chars don't know each other from a hole in the ground. :)
>
>I don't think twinking should be acceptable just because level 50 people
are
>bored. They should give the level 50 people something to do then. :)
>
>If you adventure and get an item you can't use.. give it to someone else.
>Trade it for something of an appropriate level that you CAN use.
>
>> Yes this will not happen because Verant does not have a problem with
>> twinking. If you adventure and get a item you can't use why shouldn't you
>be
>> able to make a new char and use it? That's what Verant said's and I
happen
>> to agree because what else is there for a level 50 to do?
>>
>> Naeeldar
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
